class.name: TransformContainer
class.brief_description: Applies a transformation (offset, rotation, and scale) to child controls.
class.description: [TransformContainer] transforms all of its child [Control] nodes according to its transform properties. The control is first stretched to its full rectangle (like in [MarginContainer]) and then the transformation is applied on top. It's possible to freely offset, scale, and rotate the node, making it useful for animations.

members.member: Position offset applied to this container's child controls. If [member transform_offset_relative_to_size] is [code]true[/code], the offset is relative to the container's [member Control.size].
If [code]true[/code], [member transform_offset] is relative to the child node's [member Control.size], otherwise it represents absolute pixel values.

Pivot used for [member transform_rotation] and [member transform_scale]. If [member transform_pivot_relative_to_size] is [code]true[/code], the pivot is relative to the node's size, otherwise it represents absolute pixel values.
If [code]true[/code], [member transform_pivot] is relative to the node's [member Control.size], otherwise it represents absolute pixel values.
Rotation applied to this container's child controls. The rotation pivot is defined by [member transform_pivot].
Helper property to access [member transform_rotation] in degrees instead of radians.
Scale applied to this container's child controls. The scale pivot is defined by [member transform_pivot].
